descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD & [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37584/]MontyX\'s Race Compatibility Mod (MXRC)[/url]
Has support for Better Vampires, if you want it.

OPTIONAL FILE TO REMOVE VAMPIRE WINGS

FOR NO BUGS WITH VAMPIRE LORD MORPHING.
DO NOT SWITCH TO THIS RACE AS A VAMPIRE.
YOU MUST CURE YOURSELF OF VAMPIRISM BEFORE YOU USE THIS.
MAKE SURE YOU SAVE YOUR GAME ON FIRST USE OF THIS MOD.
EXIT SKYRIM, THEN RELOAD THE SAVED GAME.
THIS WILL ALLOW FOR THE SCRIPTS TO ADDJUST.
Sorry, but I have to make it clear.

DON\'T ACTIVATE MORE THAN ONE CUSTOM RACE WHEN FIRST USING MXRC.
If you want to use more than one race with MXRC.
only add one at a time IN-BETWEEN SAVING & RELOADING Skyrim.
otherwise the Race scripts will add them in the Racelists in the wrong order.
Causing you to turn in to the wrong Custom Vampire Race, or be Cured as the wrong Race.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is Version - Is not compatible with the one on the Steam Workshop.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Frost Elves, known as the Frosmer, have traveled far from their homeland seeking refuge in 
Skyrim\'s Snowy regions. Their homeland has melted due to climate changes. 
Creatures of Ice, they are immune to Frost. They are skilled in Archery and Duel Weapons. 
Stealth is their game, so trickery is in order. 
They have been known to hold great magic and even on some cases, 
causing self corruption as Necromancers. 
So... Will you be at one with the frost, or melt away with thoughts of destruction? 

This is not an update of the original mod. 
It has been entirely recreated, with new textures, effects and features. 
You can use custom hair mods with this race. 

Features: 
Glowing Body Tattoos and Facial Complexions. 
Added some hair that is usually unplayable. 

Abilities: 
100% Resistance to Frost (Sorry no Overpowered Features) 

Race Skill Bonuses: 
Archery 10 
One-Handed 10 
Destruction 5 
Sneak 5 
Speech 5 

Spells: 
Counjure Frosmer Bow - A pale blue glowing Bow and Arrows that light up dark areas. 
Summon Frostmane - A frosty horse with frost trails. 
Summon Frostmere - Arvak style frosty horse with frost trails. 
Summon a Frosmer Cat - Can be mounted, also is frosty with frost trails. 
Call of the Frosmer - Frost Night Eye with Invulnerability. Makes you more frosty with frost trails. 

All the spells can be found in the Power category of magic. 

If you have any questions or comments feel free to post. 
Please do not ask me to change anything, as I like it the way it is. 

I hope you enjoy this mod and the new Frost Elf Appearance. 
Credit goes to Guffeh, for permission to use his wings mesh.

If you want your most EPIC screenshots of your Frost Elf on this page, 
Send it to: demonrace@live.com.au or Post a Link. 

-MontyX
author: MontaugeX
